thread.title: Widow of musician Frank Zappa dies at 70
thread.title_full: Widow of musician Frank Zappa dies at 70

author: senh
title: Widow of musician Frank Zappa dies at 70
text: BING NEWS: Widow of Musician Frank Zappa Dies at 70 Gail Zappa, the widow of music legend Frank Zappa, has died at her Los Angeles home. She was 70. Family spokeswoman Marcee Rondan says Zappa was surrounded by her children when she died Wednesday. There's no word on the cause of her death. She was 22 when ... 10/7/2015 - 3:37 pm | View Link Gail Zappa, widow of music legend Frank Zappa, dies age 70 at Los Angeles home surrounded by children after long illness She devoted herself to partnering with her husband in the music business and raising their children, Moon Unit, Dweezil, Ahmet and Diva,' the Zappa family said in a statement. Gail was age 22 and pregnant when she married musician Frank in September 1967. 10/7/2015 - 3:37 pm | View Link Gail Zappa, Frank Zappa’s Widow, Dies at 70 After Frank’s death in 1993 from cancer at age 52, Gail took control of her late husband’s music as part of the Zappa Family Trust, which has diligently guarded the late musician’s image and work over the years. Zappa met 22-year-old Adelaide Gail ... 10/7/2015 - 2:14 pm | View Link Frank Zappa’s Widow Gail Zappa Dies at 70 Frank and Gail Zappa had four children – Moon Unit, Dweezil, Ahmet and Diva – during their marriage, which lasted until the musician’s death. It was reported earlier this year that Ahmet would be taking over as head of the Zappa Family Trust. 10/7/2015 - 1:53 pm | View Link Zappa's widow loses trademark case over own name A German music festival dedicated to the work of unconventional rock musician Frank Zappa can continue to use a version of his name without infringing on the trademark rights of his estate, a court has ruled. Zappa's widow cannot enforce her rights to the ...
